content.rendered:
The University of La Verne admission counselors assist prospective students as they navigate the application and admission process. You will meet admission counselors when they visit your high school, when you participate in a college night program, when you schedule an information session and tour of the campus, or when you attend one of numerous events hosted by the Office of Admission. Take a look at our travel calendar to see when we will be in your area.

Loading

Luz Cabada

Assistant Director, TUG Admissions

Works with students from: San Fernando Valley, West LA, Hollywood, Wilshire, San Diego County (Alaska, Idaho, Oregon, Washington)

See Luz’s Schedule »

Liliana Hernandez

Admission Counselor

Works with students from: Central Coast, Santa Barbara, West Ventura, Great Imperial Valley, Riverside County (Arkansas, Kansas, Montana, Nebraska, North Dakota, Oklahoma, South Dakota)

See Liliana’s Schedule »

Will Martinez

Admissions Counselor

Works with students from: East Los Angeles, South Bay, South Los Angeles, Long Beach, San Bernardino County (Colorado, Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Texas, Vermont)

See William’s Schedule »

Matthew Rinehart

Assistant Director of Undergraduate Admission

Works with students from: Transfer students and Hawaii

See Matthew’s Schedule »

Jolene Rojas

Assistant Director of International Admission
